plot outline: Shivanna is the ideal citizen, who resides in the birthplace of poet-writer Dr Doddarange Gowda. He considers the writer his idol and also sings all his famous songs at concerts. His dream is to bring his idol to their village and celebrate his greatness.
title: Halli Sogadu
plot: Shivanna is the ideal citizen, who resides in the birthplace of poet-writer Dr Doddarange Gowda. He considers the writer his idol and also sings all his famous songs at concerts. His dream is to bring his idol to their village and celebrate his greatness.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
